entry.def: A merry-go-round is a large circular platform at a fairground on which there are model animals or vehicles for people to sit on or in as it turns round.

entry.tran: 一连串的相关活动;走马灯似的活动
entry.def: You can refer to a continuous series of activities as a merry-go-round .

example.ex: ...a merry-go-round of teas, fetes, musical events and the like.
example.tran: 一连串的茶会、游乐会、音乐活动以及诸如此类的事情

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
